forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: fix/improve placed sub-things

comments.text: placed subs are so broken they allow you to bypass a lot of anyland rules. you can placed sub one thing to multiple others which led to my making accelerating vehicles, (continued)
ruining positional data, and i'm pretty sure it crashed the servers once or twice. you can basically stack and convert subs freely if you can wade through the jank. end my pain

thread.latestCommentText: ruining positional data, and i'm pretty sure it crashed the servers once or twice. you can basically stack and convert subs freely if you can wade through the jank. end my pain
